sqlMap.sql: ID, APPNO, DEBET_NO, DEBET_ID, MAST_CONTNO, LNCI_TYPE, LNCI_STATUS, LNCI_AMT, LNCI_BAL, FIVELEVEL, LOAN_TYPE, START_DATE, END_DATE, MGRNO, BAIL_AMOUNT, FIRST_BAIL_RATIO, ORDER_NO, ACCOUNT_NO, BILL_TYPE, BAIL_ACCOUNT, BILL_NUM, LOAN_DAYS, ADD_BAIL_AMOUNT, CONFIRM_STATUS, TOTAL_BAIL_AMOUNT, SLAVE_LIMIT, SLAVE_CONTNO, ADD_CASH_EQT_AMT, INIT_CASH_EQT_AMT, AMOUNT_IN, AMOUNT_OUT, AMOUNT_UP_OUT, NUM, BUSS_BRCODE, RATE, REPAY_METHOD, GRACE_DAYS, LOAN_USE, RATE_TYPE, RATE_FLOAT_TYPE, RATE_FLOAT_VALUE, BASE_YEAR_RATE, RATE_ADJUST_TYPE, PROTOCOL_NO, DRAFT_BRCODE, SIGN_BRCODE, PRE_PAY_BRCODE, EB_FLAG, RISK_AMT, AVALIABLE_AMT, ACCT_BRCODE, MAST_CONTCODE, PRODUCT_ID, CUSTCD, CURCD, HAS_INDIRECT_CREDIT, CREDIT_CUSTCD, OTHER_CUSTCD, ORG_DEBET_ID, DRAWBACK_TERM, LOAN_APPNO, PRODUCT_CODE, STATE, CREDIT_NO, OWN_FUND_PAY_AMT
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_LAN_APPLI_LNCI_BASE
order by $orderByClause$

select sum(nvl(T2.LNCI_AMT,0)) - sum(nvl(T2.BAIL_AMOUNT,0)) - sum(nvl(T2.INIT_CASH_EQT_AMT,0)) AS AMT from B_PBC_APPLI_BASE_INFO T1, B_LAN_APPLI_LNCI_BASE T2 ,B_CRR_LN_CON T3 where T1.APPNO = T2.APPNO and T3.APP_ID = T2.MAST_CONTCODE and T1.APPLI_STATUS_DTL = '007' and T3.VID_NO = #protocolNo:VARCHAR#

select sum(nvl(T2.LNCI_AMT,0)) - sum(nvl(T2.BAIL_AMOUNT,0)) - sum(nvl(T2.INIT_CASH_EQT_AMT,0)) AS RISKAMT from B_PBC_APPLI_BASE_INFO T1, B_LAN_APPLI_LNCI_BASE T2 where T1.APPNO = T2.APPNO and T1.APPLI_STATUS_DTL = '007' and T2.MAST_CONTNO = #mastContno:VARCHAR#
select sum(nvl(T2.LNCI_AMT,0)) as LNCIAMT from B_PBC_APPLI_BASE_INFO T1, B_LAN_APPLI_LNCI_BASE T2 where T1.APPNO = T2.APPNO and T1.APPLI_STATUS_DTL = '007' and T2.MAST_CONTNO = #mastContno:VARCHAR#

#firstBailRatio:DECIMAL#, #orderNo:VARCHAR#, #accountNo:VARCHAR#, #billType:CHAR#, #bailAccount:VARCHAR#, #billNum:DECIMAL#, #loanDays:VARCHAR#, #addBailAmount:DECIMAL#, #confirmStatus:CHAR#,
